long_description: at thrive advanced care, we help your child thrive by creating lasting change through individualized aba therapy. thrive advanced care is a board-certified behavior analyst (bcba) -owned provider of aba therapy. using evidence-based principles of behavior analysis, we work to improve communication, social, and adaptive living skills. from there, each goal is targeted through individualized programming created with their strengths and interests in mind. highly trained therapists provide effective direct care with ongoing bcba supervision. we recognize that it is challenging to navigate behavioral health services alone, which is why we also specialize in collaborative relationships with families, local agencies, and other professional service providers. thrive advanced care delivers individualized, research-backed aba interventions to children, ages 2-10, affected by autism spectrum disorder (asd), as well as other behavioral and/or emotional challenges. thrive advanced care not only provides high-quality, individualized care, but we also support and empower parents and caregivers with a collaborative approach.
generated_description: thrive advanced care is a company based in richardson, texas, specializing in applied behavior analysis (aba) therapy for children aged 2-10 with autism spectrum disorder (asd) and other behavioral and emotional challenges. the company is owned by a board-certified behavior analyst (bcba) and provides individualized, evidence-based treatment programs. thrive advanced care offers a range of services including center-based therapy, parent training, and social skills development. their approach emphasizes compassionate care, respect, and open communication, aiming to help children achieve independence and better behavior through structured, supportive environments.
